description: Experiencing profound transformation where sense of self dissolves to embrace identity as object, tool, or thing. Feeling deep stillness and detachment from personal desires as mind quiets and purpose simplifies. Finding calmness and surrender while being valued for utility or aesthetic rather than individuality.
appeal: This headspace attracts individuals overwhelmed by complex identity maintenance and constant self-assertion demands. The appeal lies in experiencing radical simplification through identity dissolution into pure object functionality. Autonomy-burdened personalities find relief through systematic self-concept reduction, while purpose-seekers discover meaning through utility-based existence. The mechanism operates through progressive human complexity elimination, replacing conscious agency with simplified object-state being and value through function rather than identity.
